message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
I think we can both do better. Let's try 60/40, with you getting the larger share this time.
You had your chance, now it's my turn again. 65-35 is the new deal.
Let's be reasonable. Inflation is hurting us both. 45/55 is a fair compromise that gives us both a decent share.
Inflation is only hurting you, I'm not feeling the pinch. 70-30 is my new offer.
